ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Concordance and discordance of homologous gene regulation allows comparing reaction to stimuli in different organisms,  for example human patients and animal models of a disease. The package contains functions to calculate discordance and concordance score for homologous gene pairs, identify concordantly or discordantly regulated transcriptional modules and visualize the results. It is intended for analysis of transcriptional data.

Concordance and discordance of homologous gene regulation allows comparing reaction to stimuli in different organisms,  for example human patients and animal models of a disease. The package contains functions to calculate discordance and concordance score for homologous gene pairs, identify concordantly or discordantly regulated transcriptional modules and visualize the results. It is intended for analysis of transcriptional data.

name: r-disco
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.6' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-disco
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/disco_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/disco/disco_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e39b7319758bc9b987a38a656505b58d5f890c3e4be619a400bc92e581837ba9

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-tmod
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-tmod

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('disco')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('disco')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=disco
  license: GPL (>= 2.0)
  summary: Concordance and discordance of homologous gene regulation allows comparing reaction
    to stimuli in different organisms,  for example human patients and animal models
    of a disease. The package contains functions to calculate discordance and concordance
    score for homologous gene pairs, identify concordantly or discordantly regulated
    transcriptional modules and visualize the results. It is intended for analysis of
    transcriptional data.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - jenzopr
